comment.author: 25476954@N08
comment._content: "Miss" Chase – an unwed mother? Rather controversial for the time, don't you think?

comment.author: 25476954@N08
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/95644941@N04] Yeah: I remember, waaay back in the early 1990's, Someone tried to market a Barbie-sized doll that was pregnant. Her name was "Judith." There was a pressure plate in the stomach area where the baby was "stored" until the "birth". When the baby was removed, the plate popped back into place as a normal-looking abdomen. She was made by a European toy company, but as you might imagine, parenting groups in the USA were LIVID !! Just do an eBay search for "Pregnant Barbie" and all sorts of weird contraptions will come up…
